Segment.name: PO3
Segment.comment: To specify additional item-related data involving variations in normal price/quantity structure

Field.name: ChangeReasonCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the reason for price or quantity change

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: UnitPrice
Field.comment: Price per unit of product, service, commodity, etc.

Field.name: BasisOfUnitPriceCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of unit price for an item

Field.name: UnitOrBasisForMeasurementCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the units in which a value is being expressed, or manner in which a measurement has been taken

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content
